Articles.Content: i'm having problems getting my rovers to run smoothly over terrain, sometimes the wheels will go to their maximum height and my rover will start bouncing sporadically for a few seconds then the wheels suspension will lower back down. i do have a modded ksp but i can produce this same bug even in unmodded. i also have a problem with bumps inbetween the ksp building at the devider lines that always break my wheels or completly destroy my rover when i go over them. if theres a way i can fix both of these do please let me know.
